title: Color Scheme
description:
Create a consistent color scheme using CSS custom properties.

## Requirements

1. Define CSS custom properties on `:root`:
   - --color-primary: #2563eb
   - --color-secondary: #64748b
   - --color-background: #f8fafc
   - --color-text: #1e293b
   - --color-accent: #f59e0b

2. Style the `.page` container:
   - Background color: use var(--color-background)
   - Color (text): use var(--color-text)
   - Padding: 2rem

3. Style `.btn-primary`:
   - Background color: use var(--color-primary)
   - Color: white
   - Padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem
   - Border: none
   - Border radius: 0.375rem

4. Style `.btn-secondary`:
   - Background color: use var(--color-secondary)
   - Color: white
   - Same padding, border, and border-radius as primary

5. Style `.accent-text`:
   - Color: use var(--color-accent)

testCases.description: .page should use background from custom property

hints: Don't forget border: none on buttons
